requirements.summary: Identify and resolve the compilation or deployment error that prevented the previous build from successfully deploying to the Internet Computer network
acceptanceCriteria: The canister successfully deploys to the Internet Computer network
All existing functionality remains operational after deployment

file_operations.description: Review and fix any TypeScript compilation errors, import issues, or routing configuration problems that may be preventing the build. Ensure all imported components and types are correctly referenced and that the router configuration is valid.

Review and fix any TypeScript errors related to backend method calls, type mismatches between frontend types and backend interface types, or React Query configuration issues. Ensure all backend methods are called with correct parameters and return types match expectations.
Fix any TypeScript errors related to the UserProfile type, avatar customization, or form validation. Ensure the component correctly handles the profile data structure matching the backend interface.
Review and fix any issues with ExternalBlob handling, media display, or interaction with backend methods. Ensure proper type safety and error handling for optional media fields.
Fix any TypeScript errors related to conversation types, message handling, or participant display logic. Ensure compatibility with the Conversation and Message types from the backend interface.
Review and fix any issues with report handling, moderation action types, or enum usage. Ensure all ModerationType and ViolationType enums are used correctly according to the backend interface.
Fix any TypeScript errors related to report status updates, filtering logic, or admin permission checks. Ensure proper integration with the authorization system.
Review and fix any issues with SectionType enum usage, post filtering, or route parameters. Ensure the section types match exactly with the backend SectionType enum values.
